milestones.title: Project Genesis
milestones.description: Infrastructure setup begins. Docker, WSL2, Ollama configured.

milestones.title: Adam & Eve Created
milestones.description: First two specimens deployed. Control pair established.

milestones.title: Model Wars
milestones.description: Tested 10+ LLMs. llama3.2 selected for personality consistency.

milestones.title: Language Expansion
milestones.description: Spanish, German, Chinese, Japanese specimens deployed.

milestones.title: SecureClaw Integration
milestones.description: OWASP LLM Top 10 security framework deployed.

milestones.title: Public Launch
milestones.description: GitHub repo live. Website deployed. AIthropology paper published.
